remarks: Obsolete theorem as of 22-Dec-2018.  Use ~ moimi applied to ~ ax-1 , as demonstrated in the proof.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jul-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 22-Dec-2018.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: morimOLD $p |- ( E* x ( ph -> ps ) -> ( ph -> E* x ps ) ) $.
